de.gwdg.metadataqa.marc.utils.marcspec
Implementation of Carsten Klee's MARCspec MARCspec - A common MARC record path language Carsten Klee (ZDB) 2017-11-20 (version 0.16beta+2) https://marcspec.github.io/MARCspec/marc-spec.html 9.2 Reference to field data fieldSpec = fieldTag [index] [characterSpec] --- LDR field data of the leader 00.
